a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Average annual working hours per worker, United Kingdom, 1260 to
Shown is the composite series of average hours worked per year, which adjusts for part-time work, sickness, holidays, and
Data source: Bank of England, A Millennium of Macroeconomic Data (2016)
Note: The data series joins together numerous sources and is considered tentative by its authors, especially before 1770. Data before
1700 refers to England; data thereafter refers to the UK.
